data.title: Climbers scaling Mt Everest must bring back 8 kg of garbage under new rules to clean up the peak
A draft European law requiring all phones sold in the EU to be compatible with a common charger was approved by the European Parliament yesterday.

NYT: Malaysian Military Radar data shows missing MH370 climbed to 45,000 feet before descending unevenly to 23,000 feet. Rolls-Royce engines data shows it descending 40,000 feet in the space of a minute. American official says "A lot of this doesn't make sense."
MH370: US officials said that because two separate communication systems were shut down separately, the plane did not suffer a catastrophic accident.
